titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nabil Yaldo.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden under the authority of the order of May 1, 87 without amendment. With written report No. 100-49.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 107.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Makes certain restrictions of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to the approval of petitions for immigrant status inapplicable in the case of a named individual.
